mva2.adapter.util

Interface OnSelectionChangedListener<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - Refers to the model class

    public interface OnSelectionChangedListener<M>
    Listener to listen for changes if an item is selected or un-selected. This can be used if the adapter has the selection mode as Mode.SINGLE
    See Also:
    for possible values

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSelectionChanged(M item, boolean isSelected, java.util.List<M> selectedItems)
      Called when the selection is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onSelectionChanged

        void onSelectionChanged(M item,
                        boolean isSelected,
                        java.util.List<M> selectedItems)
        Called when the selection is changed. Even if you are using Mode.SINGLE, selected items will be provided as a list. If no item is selected, it will provide an empty list.
        Parameters:
        item - Item which is currently selected / unselected
        isSelected - Denotes whether the item was selected or unselected
        selectedItems - List of selected items. It will be empty if no items are selected
